title: WHYS: Does it matter if the next James Bond is black?
teaser: There's reaction to the detention of Alexei Navalny in Russia and a debate's been sparked by one of the hacked Sony emails: 'Idris Elba should be the next Bond' the head of Sony Pictures reportedly wrote.  'As absurd as casting George Clooney as Barack Obama', said right-wing commentator Rush Limbaugh, adding 'Bond is white. Bond was never black'.  Should all casting be colour-blind?
